info.title: slskd
info.description: A modern client-server application for the Soulseek file sharing network

get.summary: Gets the current state of the application.
Gets the current application version.
Checks for updates.
Generates a memory dump for debugging purposes.

put.summary: Acknowledges the given message id for the given username.

404.description: A conversation with the specified username, or a message matching the specified id could not be found.

put.summary: Acknowledges all messages from the given username.

404.description: A conversation with the specified username could not be found.

delete.summary: Closes the conversation associated with the given username.

404.description: A conversation with the specified username could not be found.

get.summary: Gets the conversation associated with the specified username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username associated with the desired conversation.

404.description: A matching search was not found.

post.summary: Sends a private message to the specified username.

400.description: The specified message is null or empty.

get.summary: Gets all active conversations.
Gets all messages for the conversation associated with the specified username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username associated with the desired conversation.

parameters.name: unAcknowledgedOnly
parameters.description: Return only unacknowledged messages.

404.description: A conversation with the specified username could not be found.

get.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of past event records.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset (number of records) at which to start the requested page.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The page size.

400.description: The offset is less than zero, or if the limit is less than or equal to zero.

403.description: Authentication is valid but not sufficient to access this endpoint.

post.summary: Raises a sample event of the specified type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of event to raise.

requestBody.description: An optional string used to disambiguate generated events.

400.description: The specified type is not a valid event type.

403.description: Authentication is valid but not sufficient to access this endpoint.

get.summary: Lists the contents of the downloads directory.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: An optional value indicating whether to recursively list subdirectories and files.

get.summary: Lists the contents of the specified subdirectory within the downloads directory.

parameters.name: base64SubdirectoryName
parameters.description: The relative, base 64 encoded, name of the subdirectory to list.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: An optional value indicating whether to recursively list subdirectories and files.

403.description: Access to the specified subdirectory was denied.

404.description: The specified subdirectory does not exist.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified subdirectory within the downloads directory.

parameters.name: base64SubdirectoryName
parameters.description: The relative, base 64 encoded, name of the subdirectory to delete.

403.description: Access to the specified subdirectory was denied.

404.description: The specified subdirectory does not exist.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified file within the downloads directory.

parameters.name: base64FileName
parameters.description: The relative, base 64 encoded, name of the file to delete.

403.description: Access to the specified subdirectory was denied.

404.description: The specified subdirectory does not exist.

get.summary: Lists the contents of the downloads directory.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: An optional value indicating whether to recursively list subdirectories and files.

get.summary: Lists the contents of the specified subdirectory within the incomplete directory.

parameters.name: base64SubdirectoryName
parameters.description: The relative, base 64 encoded, name of the subdirectory to list.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: An optional value indicating whether to recursively list subdirectories and files.

403.description: Access to the specified subdirectory was denied.

404.description: The specified subdirectory does not exist.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified subdirectory within the downloads directory.

parameters.name: base64SubdirectoryName
parameters.description: The relative, base 64 encoded, name of the subdirectory to delete.

403.description: Access to the specified subdirectory was denied.

404.description: The specified subdirectory does not exist.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified file within the downloads directory.

parameters.name: base64FileName
parameters.description: The relative, base 64 encoded, name of the file to delete.

403.description: Access to the specified subdirectory was denied.

404.description: The specified subdirectory does not exist.

get.summary: Gets the last few application logs.
Gets the current application options.
Gets the application options provided at startup.
Gets the debug view of the current application options.
Gets the location of the YAML configuration file.

403.description: Remote configuration is disabled.

get.summary: Gets the content of the YAML configuration file.

403.description: Remote configuration is disabled.
Remote configuration is disabled.

200.description: The YAML is valid or returns validation error.

403.description: Remote configuration is disabled.
Relay is not configured in agent mode.
Relay is not configured in agent mode.

get.summary: Downloads a file from the connected controller.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the request.

403.description: Relay is not configured in controller mode.

404.description: The file could not be found.

post.summary: Uploads a file to the connected controller.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the request.

400.description: The token is invalid or the request is malformed.

403.description: Relay is not configured in agent mode.

post.summary: Uploads share information to the connected controller.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the request.

400.description: The token is invalid or the request is malformed.

403.description: Relay is not configured in agent mode.

get.summary: Gets all rooms.

304.description: The room has already been joined.

get.summary: Gets the specified room.

404.description: The specified roomName could not be found.
The room has not been joined.

post.summary: Sends a message to the specified room.

404.description: The specified roomName could not be found.

get.summary: Gets the current list of messages for the specified room.

404.description: The specified roomName could not be found.

post.summary: Sets a ticker for the specified room.

404.description: The specified roomName could not be found.

post.summary: Adds a member to a private room.

404.description: The specified roomName could not be found.

get.summary: Gets the current list of users for the specified room.

404.description: The specified roomName could not be found.

get.summary: Gets a list of rooms from the server.

post.summary: Performs a search for the specified request.

get.summary: Gets the list of active and completed searches.
Gets the state of the search corresponding to the specified id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id of the search.

parameters.name: includeResponses
parameters.description: A value indicating whether to include search responses in the response.

404.description: A matching search was not found.

put.summary: Stops the search corresponding to the specified id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id of the search.

304.description: The search was not in progress.

404.description: A matching search was not found.

delete.summary: Deletes the search corresponding to the specified id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id of the search.

404.description: A search with the specified id could not be found.

get.summary: Gets the state of the search corresponding to the specified id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id of the search.

404.description: A matching search was not found.

403.description: Forbidden
Forbidden

get.summary: Retrieves the current state of the server.

403.description: Forbidden

get.summary: Checks whether the provided authentication is valid.
get.description: This is a no-op provided so that the application can test for an expired token on load.

403.description: The authentication is is invalid.

get.summary: Checks whether security is enabled.

200.description: True if security is enabled, false otherwise.

get.summary: Gets the current list of shares.

put.summary: Initiates a scan of the configured shares.

409.description: A share scan is already in progress.

delete.summary: Cancels a share scan, if one is running.

404.description: Not Found

409.description: A share scan was not in progress.

get.summary: Gets the share associated with the specified <see paramref="id" />.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the share.

404.description: The requested share could not be found.

get.summary: Returns a list of all shared directories and files.
Gets the contents of the share associated with the specified <see paramref="id" />.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the share.

404.description: The requested share could not be found.

get.summary: Gets all application metrics.
get.description:
If the 'Accept' header is set to 'text/plain', the response is in Prometheus format. Otherwise if 'application/json' is set,
the metrics are formatted into a dictionary.

get.summary: Gets gets key performance indicators (KPIs) for the application.
Gets a summary of all transfer activity over the specified timeframe, grouped by direction and final state.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time of the window (default: 7 days ago).

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time of the window (default: now).

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: An optional direction (Upload, Download) by which to filter records.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: An optional username by which to filter records.

get.summary:
Gets a histogram of all transfer activity over the specified timeframe, aggregated into fixed size time intervals
and grouped by direction and final state.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time of the window (default: 7 days ago).

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time of the window (default: now).

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The interval, in minutes (default: 60).

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: An optional direction (Upload, Download) by which to filter records.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: An optional username by which to filter records.

get.summary: Gets the top N user summaries by count, total bytes, or average speed.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction (Upload, Download).

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time of the window (default: 12/30/2025).

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time of the window (default: now).

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The property by which to sort (Count, TotalBytes, AverageSpeed. Default: Count).

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The sort order (ASC, DESC. Default: DESC).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return (Default: 25).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The record offset (if paginating).

get.summary: Gets detailed transfer activity for the specified user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time of the summary window (default: 7 days ago).

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time of the summary window (default: now).

get.summary: Gets a list of transfer exceptions by direction.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: An optional username by which to filter exceptions.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The sort order (ASC, DESC. Default: DESC).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return (Default: 25).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The record offset (if paginating).

get.summary: Gets the top N exceptions by total count and direction.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: An optional username by which to filter exceptions.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return (Default: 25).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The record offset (if paginating).

get.summary: Gets the top N most frequently downloaded directories by total count and distinct users.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time of the window (default: 12/30/2025).

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time of the window (default: now).

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: An optional username by which to filter records.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return (Default: 25).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The record offset (if paginating).

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the download source.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the download.

parameters.name: remove
parameters.description: A value indicating whether the tracked download should be removed after cancellation.

404.description: The specified download was not found.
Not Found

delete.summary: Removes all completed downloads, regardless of whether they failed or succeeded.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the upload destination.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the upload.

parameters.name: remove
parameters.description: A value indicating whether the tracked upload should be removed after cancellation.

404.description: The specified upload was not found.

get.summary: Gets the upload for the specified username matching the specified filename.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the upload destination.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the upload.

delete.summary: Removes all completed uploads, regardless of whether they failed or succeeded.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the download source.

403.description: The download was rejected.

get.summary: Gets all downloads for the specified username.
Gets all downloads.

Gets the download for the specified username matching the specified filename, and requests
the current place in the remote queue of the specified download.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the download source.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the download.

404.description: The specified download was not found.

get.summary: Gets all uploads.
Gets all uploads for the specified username.
Retrieves the address of the specified username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user.

404.description: The specified user could not be found or is offline.

get.summary: Retrieves the files shared by the specified username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user.

404.description: The specified user could not be found or is offline.

get.summary: Retrieves the status of the current browse operation for the specified username, if any.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user.

404.description: No browse operation is in progress for the specified user.

post.summary: Retrieves the files from the specified directory from the specified username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user.

404.description: The specified user could not be found or is offline.

get.summary: Retrieves information about the specified username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user.

404.description: The specified user could not be found or is offline.

get.summary: Retrieves status for the specified username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user.

404.description: The specified user could not be found or is offline.

expires.description: Gets the time at which the Access Token expires.

issued.description: Gets the time at which the Access Token was issued.

name.description: Gets the value of the Name claim from the Access Token.

notBefore.description: Gets the value of the Not Before claim from the Access Token.

fullName.description: The fully qualified name of the directory.

createdAt.description: The timestamp at which the directory was created.

modifiedAt.description: The timestamp at which the directory was last modified.

slskd.Files.FilesystemDirectory.description: A file directory on the host filesystem.

fullName.description: The fully qualified name of the file.

length.description: The size of the file, in bytes.

createdAt.description: The timestamp at which the file was created.

modifiedAt.description: The timestamp at which the file was last modified.

slskd.Files.FilesystemFile.description: A file on the host filesystem.

timestamp.description: The UTC timestamp of the message.

id.description: The unique message id, used to acknowledge receipt.

username.description: The username of the remote user.

isAcknowledged.description: A value indicating whether the message has been acknowledged.

wasReplayed.description: A value indicating whether the message has was replayed by the server.

isPrivate.description: A value indicating whether the room is private.

operatorCount.description: The number of operators in the room, if private.

operators.description: The operators in the room, if private.

owner.description: The owner of the room, if private.

users.description: The list of users in the room.

username.description: The username of the user who sent the message.

roomName.description: The room to which the message pertains.

slskd.Messaging.RoomMessage.description: A message sent to a room.

debug.description: Gets a value indicating whether the application should run in debug mode.

headless.description: Gets a value indicating whether the application should run in headless (no web UI) mode.

remoteConfiguration.description: Gets a value indicating whether remote configuration of options is allowed.

remoteFileManagement.description: Gets a value indicating whether remote file management is allowed.

instanceName.description: Gets the unique name for this instance.

rooms.description: Gets a list of rooms to automatically join upon connection.

enabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether blacklist file support should be enabled.

file.description: Gets the path to the blacklist file.

incomplete.description: Gets the path where incomplete downloads are saved.

downloads.description: Gets the path where downloaded files are saved.

swagger.description: Gets a value indicating whether swagger documentation and UI should be enabled.

request.description: Gets the list of search request filters.

noLogo.description: Gets a value indicating whether the logo should be suppressed on startup.

noStart.description: Gets a value indicating whether the application should quit after initialization.

noConfigWatch.description: Gets a value indicating whether the application should watch the configuration file for changes.

noConnect.description: Gets a value indicating whether the application should connect to the Soulseek network on startup.

noShareScan.description: Gets a value indicating whether the application should scan shared directories on startup.

forceShareScan.description: Gets a value indicating whether shares should be forcibly re-scanned on startup.

forceMigrations.description: Gets a value indicating whether to force database migrations to be applied on startup.

noVersionCheck.description: Gets a value indicating whether the application should check for a newer version on startup.

logSQL.description: Gets a value indicating whether Entity Framework queries should be logged.

logUnobservedExceptions.description: Gets a value indicating whether to log unobserved Exceptions.

experimental.description: Gets a value indicating whether the application should run in experimental mode.

volatile.description: Gets a value indicating whether the application should run in volatile mode.

caseSensitiveRegEx.description: Gets a value indicating whether user-defined regular expressions are case sensitive.

legacyWindowsTcpKeepalive.description:
Gets a value indicating whether to use legacy TCP keepalive options, for Windows
versions prior to Windows 10, version 1709 (and associated Server SKUs).

optimisticRelayFileInfo.description:
Gets a value indicating whether to use the uploaded shares from Relay agents as the source of
truth for file existence and size, instead of querying the agent prior to enqueueing the file.

noSqlitePooling.description: Gets a value indicating whether SQLite pooling should be disabled.

slots.description: Gets the limit for the total number of download slots.

speedLimit.description: Gets the total download speed limit, in kibibytes.

slots.description: Gets the limit for the total number of upload slots.

speedLimit.description: Gets the total upload speed limit, in kibibytes.

userDefined.description: Gets user defined groups and options.

members.description: Gets the list of group member usernames.

cidrs.description: Gets the list of group CIDRs.

files.description: Gets the minimum number of shared files required to avoid being classified as a leecher.

directories.description: Gets the minimum number of shared directories required to avoid being classified as a leecher.

priority.description: Gets the priority of the group.

strategy.description: Gets the queue strategy for the group.

slots.description: Gets the limit for the total number of upload slots for the group.

speedLimit.description: Gets the total upload speed limit for the group, in kibibytes.

members.description: Gets the list of group member usernames.

enabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether the FTP integration is enabled.

ignoreCertificateErrors.description: Gets a value indicating whether FTP certificate errors should be ignored.

remotePath.description: Gets the remote path for uploads.

overwriteExisting.description: Gets a value indicating whether existing files should be overwritten.

connectionTimeout.description: Gets the connection timeout value, in milliseconds.

retryAttempts.description: Gets the number of times failing uploads will be retried.

enabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether the Pushbullet integration is enabled.

accessToken.description: Gets the Pushbullet API access token.

notificationPrefix.description: Gets the prefix for Pushbullet notification titles.

notifyOnPrivateMessage.description: Gets a value indicating whether a Pushbullet notification should be sent when a private message is received.

notifyOnRoomMention.description:
Gets a value indicating whether a Pushbullet notification should be sent when the currently logged
in user's username is mentioned in a room.

retryAttempts.description: Gets the number of times failing Pushbullet notifications will be retried.

cooldownTime.description: Gets the cooldown time for Pushbullet notifications, in milliseconds.

attempts.description: Gets the number of attempts to make before failing.

on.description: Gets the list of Event types that trigger the script.

command.description: Gets the shell command to run.

args.description: Gets the arguments to pass to the executable.

arglist.description: Gets the list of arguments to pass to the executable.

name.description: Gets the name of the header.

url.description: Gets the fully qualified URL for the webhook.

headers.description: Gets the HTTP headers to include with the webhook.

ignoreCertificateErrors.description: Gets a value indicating whether HTTPS certificate errors should be ignored.

on.description: Gets the list of Event types that trigger the webhook.

timeout.description: Gets the time to wait before timing out, in milliseconds.

files.description: Gets the limit for number of files.

megabytes.description: Gets the limit for number of megabytes.

failures.description: Gets the limit for number of failures.

loki.description: Gets the URL to a Grafana Loki instance to which to log.

disk.description: Gets a value indicating whether to write logs to disk.

noColor.description: Gets a value indicating whether to suppress colorization of console logs.

enabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether the metrics endpoint should be enabled.

url.description: Gets the url for the metrics endpoint.

disabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether authentication should be disabled.

username.description: Gets the username for the metrics endpoint.

password.description: Gets the password for the metrics endpoint.

mode.description: Gets the permissions to apply to newly created files.

enabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether the relay is enabled.

cidr.description: Gets the comma separated list of CIDRs that are authorized to connect as this agent.

ignoreCertificateErrors.description: Gets a value indicating whether controller certificate errors should be ignored.

downloads.description: Gets a value indicating whether to receive completed downloads from the controller.

search.description: Gets the time to retain searches, in minutes.

logs.description: Gets the time to retain logs, in days.

complete.description: Gets the time to retain completed files, in minutes.

incomplete.description: Gets the time to retain incomplete files, in minutes.

succeeded.description: Gets the time to retain successful transfers, in minutes.

errored.description: Gets the time to retain errored transfers, in minutes.

cancelled.description: Gets the time to retain cancelled transfers, in minutes.

directories.description: Gets the list of paths to shared files.

filters.description: Gets the list of shared file filters.

storageMode.description: Gets the type of storage to use for the share cache.

workers.description: Gets the number of workers to use while scanning shares.

retention.description: Gets the time to retain the cache (the interval on which to re-scan automatically), in minutes.

address.description: Gets the address of the Soulseek server.

port.description: Gets the port of the Soulseek server.

username.description: Gets the username for the Soulseek network.

password.description: Gets the password for the Soulseek network.

description.description: Gets the description of the Soulseek user.

picture.description: Gets the file path for the user's profile picture.

listenIpAddress.description: Gets the local IP address on which to listen for incoming connections.

listenPort.description: Gets the port on which to listen for incoming connections.

read.description: Gets the connection read buffer size, in bytes.

write.description: Gets the connection write buffer size, in bytes.

transfer.description: Gets the read/write buffer size for transfers, in bytes.

writeQueue.description: Gets the size of the queue for double buffered writes.

enabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether the proxy is enabled.

username.description: Gets the proxy username, if applicable.

password.description: Gets the proxy password, if applicable.

connect.description: Gets the connection timeout value, in milliseconds.

inactivity.description: Gets the connection inactivity timeout, in milliseconds.

transfer.description: Gets the transfer connection timeout, in milliseconds.

disabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether the distributed network should be disabled.

disableChildren.description: Gets a value indicating whether to accept distributed child connections.

childLimit.description: Gets the distributed child connection limit.

logging.description: Gets a value indicating whether distributed network logging should be enabled.

socket.description: Gets the HTTP listen unix domain socket (UDS) path.

urlBase.description: Gets the base url for web requests.

contentPath.description: Gets the path to static web content.

logging.description: Gets a value indicating whether HTTP request logging should be enabled.

disabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether HTTPS should be disabled.

force.description: Gets a value indicating whether HTTP requests should be redirected to HTTPS.

pfx.description: Gets the path to the the X509 certificate .pfx file.

password.description: Gets the password for the X509 certificate.

disabled.description: Gets a value indicating whether authentication should be disabled.

username.description: Gets the username for the web UI.

password.description: Gets the password for the web UI.

role.description: Gets the role for the key.

cidr.description: Gets the comma separated list of CIDRs that are authorized to use the key.

key.description: Gets the key with which to sign JWTs.

ttl.description: Gets the TTL for JWTs, in milliseconds.

ipAddress.description: The IP address associated with the active connection.

slskd.Relay.Agent.description: Tracking information for a Relay agent.

slskd.Relay.RelayClientState.description: The state of a Relay client.

slskd.Relay.RelayMode.description: The mode the Relay is operating under.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique search identifier.

fileLimit.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of file results to accept before the search is considered complete. (Default = 10,000).

filterResponses.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether responses are to be filtered. (Default = true).

maximumPeerQueueLength.description: Gets or sets the maximum queue depth a peer may have in order for a response to be processed. (Default = 1000000).

minimumPeerUploadSpeed.description: Gets or sets the minimum upload speed a peer must have in order for a response to be processed. (Default = 0).

minimumResponseFileCount.description: Gets or sets the minimum number of files a response must contain in order to be processed. (Default = 1).

responseLimit.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of search results to accept before the search is considered complete. (Default = 100).

searchText.description: Gets or sets the search text.

searchTimeout.description: Gets or sets the search timeout value, in seconds, used to determine when the search is complete. (Default = 15).

token.description: Gets or sets the search token.

filename.description: Gets or sets the filename to download.

size.description: Gets or sets the size of the file.

localPath.description: Gets or sets the custom save path for the download.

averageSpeed.description: Gets the current average transfer speed.

bytesRemaining.description: Gets the number of remaining bytes to be transferred.

bytesTransferred.description: Gets the total number of bytes transferred.

elapsedTime.description: Gets the current duration of the transfer, if it has been started.

endTime.description: Gets the UTC time at which the transfer transitioned into the Soulseek.TransferStates.Completed state.

filename.description: Gets the filename of the file to be transferred.

percentComplete.description: Gets the current progress in percent.

placeInQueue.description: Gets the current place in queue, if it has been fetched.

remainingTime.description: Gets the projected remaining duration of the transfer.

remoteToken.description: Gets the remote unique token for the transfer.

size.description: Gets the size of the file to be transferred, in bytes.

startOffset.description: Gets the starting offset of the transfer, in bytes.

startTime.description: Gets the UTC time at which the transfer transitioned into the Soulseek.TransferStates.InProgress state.

token.description: Gets the unique token for the transfer.

username.description: Gets the username of the peer to or from which the file is to be transferred.

exception.description: Gets the Exception that caused the failure of the transfer, if applicable.

localPath.description: Gets the custom local path for saving the file (optional).

stateDescription.description: Gets the string representation of the transfer slskd.Transfers.Transfer.State.

endedAt.description: The time at which the transfer ended, or null if the transfer has not yet started or is in progress.

averageSpeed.description: Gets the average upload speed of the user.

directoryCount.description: Gets the number of directories shared by the user.

fileCount.description: Gets the number of files shared by the user.

uploadCount.description: Gets the number of uploads tracked by the server for this user.

isPrivileged.description: Gets a value indicating whether the user is privileged.

username.description: Gets the username of the user.
